trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType" /> class defines the type of the content of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: A classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType" /> define o tipo de conteúdo de uma mensagem CMS/PKCS nº 7.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType> object will be automatically generated and placed in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property whenever the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property for the corresponding signer is not empty.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType> objeto será automaticamente gerado e colocado no <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade sempre que o <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade para o assinante correspondente não está vazia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType.#ctor" /> constructor creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType" /> class.
trans-unit.target: O construtor <see cref="M:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType.#ctor" /> cria uma instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType.ContentType" /> property gets an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> object that contains the content type.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType.ContentType" /> obtém um objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> que contém o tipo de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> object that contains the content type.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Oid" /> objeto que contém o tipo de conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> object from which to copy information.
trans-unit.target: O objeto <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData" /> do qual copiar as informações.

trans-unit.source: This method replaces the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType> object with the specified <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: Esse método substitui atual <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9ContentType> objeto com especificado <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> objeto.
